name: Knights of the Round Table
overview: From the box: An adventure game which harkens back to the glorious days of yore, when dragons roamed the land, and when battles contained the harsh sound of steel upon steel upon steel and the wild roar of charging horses on the morning fields. Knights of the Round Table - a game of action and drama, where attackers charge, projectiles are tossed, swords slash and battle is in the air. Knights of the Round Table... a challenge to all video gamesmen.
